00036 #include <stdio.h>
00037 #include <signal.h>
00038 #ifndef linux
00039 #include <sgtty.h>
00040 #endif
00041 #include <sys/types.h>
00042 #include <rpc/rpc.h>
00043 #include "nfsproto.h"
00044 #include "admproto.h"
00045 #include "cfs.h"
00046 #include "shs.h"
00047 
00048 #if defined(irix) || defined(linux)
00049 /* hacks to use POSIX style termios instead of old BSD style sgttyb */
00050 #include <termios.h>
00051 #define sgttyb termios
00052 #define gtty(a,b) tcgetattr((a), (b))
00053 #define stty(a,b) tcsetattr((a), TCSAFLUSH, (b))
00054 #define sg_flags c_lflag
00055 #endif
00056 
00057         
00058 char *
00059 getpassword(prompt)
00060 char *prompt;
00061 {
00062         struct sgttyb ttyb;
00063         int flags;
00064         register char *p;
00065         register c;
00066         FILE *fi;
00067         static char pbuf[128];
00068 #ifdef MACH
00069         int (*signal())();
00070         int (*sig)();
00071 #else
00072         void (*sig)();
00073 #endif
00074 
00075         if ((fi = fdopen(open("/dev/tty", 2), "r")) == NULL)
00076                 fi = stdin;
00077         else
00078                 setbuf(fi, (char *)NULL);
00079         sig = signal(SIGINT, SIG_IGN);
00080         gtty(fileno(fi), &ttyb);
00081         flags = ttyb.sg_flags;
00082         ttyb.sg_flags &= ~ECHO;
00083         stty(fileno(fi), &ttyb);
00084         fprintf(stderr, "%s", prompt); fflush(stderr);
00085         for (p=pbuf; (c = getc(fi))!='\n' && c!=EOF;) {
00086                 if (p < &pbuf[127])
00087                         *p++ = c;
00088         }
00089         *p = '\0';
00090         fprintf(stderr, "\n"); fflush(stderr);
00091         ttyb.sg_flags = flags;
00092         stty(fileno(fi), &ttyb);
00093         signal(SIGINT, sig);
00094         if (fi != stdin)
00095                 fclose(fi);
00096         return(pbuf);
00097 }
00098 
00099 old_pwcrunch(b,k)
00100      char *b;
00101      cfs_admkey *k;
00102 {
00103         int l;
00104         u_char k1[8];
00105         u_char k2[8];
00106 
00107         if ((l=strlen(b))<3)
00108                 return -1;
00109         /* note that we always use the DES key crunch. */
00110         /* that's not a significant weakness, since here DES */
00111         /* is just being used as a non-cryptographic hash. */
00112         /* note also that k1 and k2 are created from disjoint parts */
00113         /* of the passphrase. */
00114         key_crunch(&b[l/2],l-l/2,k1);
00115         key_crunch(b,l/2,k2);
00116         switch (k->cipher) {
00117             case CFS_STD_DES:
00118                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,8);
00119                 bcopy(k2,k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.secondary,8);
00120                 break;
00121             case CFS_THREE_DES:
00122                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,8);
00123                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.secondary1,8);
00124                 bcopy(k2,k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary2,8);
00125                 bcopy(k2,k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.secondary2,8);
00126                 break;
00127             case CFS_TRUE_THREE_DES: /* this is really 2des */
00128                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary1,8);
00129                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary1,8);
00130                 bcopy(k2,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary2,8);
00131                 bcopy(k2,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary2,8);
00132                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary3,8);
00133                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary3,8);
00134                 break;
00135             case CFS_MACGUFFIN:
00136                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.primary,8);
00137                 bcopy(k2,&(k->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.primary[8]),8);
00138                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.secondary,8);
00139                 bcopy(k2,&(k->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.secondary[8]),8);
00140                 break;
00141             case CFS_BLOWFISH:
00142                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.primary,8);
00143                 bcopy(k2,&(k->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.primary[8]),8);
00144                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.secondary,8);
00145                 bcopy(k2,&(k->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.secondary[8]),8);
00146                 break;
00147             case CFS_SAFER_SK128:
00148                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.primary,8);
00149                 bcopy(k2,&(k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.primary[8]),8);
00150                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.secondary,8);
00151                 bcopy(k2,&(k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.secondary[8]),8);
00152             default:
00153                 break;
00154         }
00155         return 0;
00156 }
00157 new_pwcrunch(b,k)
00158      char *b;
00159      cfs_admkey *k;
00160 {
00161         int l;
00162         u_char *k1;
00163         u_char *k2;
00164         u_char *k3;
00165         u_char *hash;
00166         u_char h1[20];
00167         u_char h2[20];
00168         
00169         if ((l=strlen(b))<3)
00170                 return -1;
00171         hash = qshs(b,l);
00172         bcopy(hash,h1,20);
00173         k1 = h1;
00174         k2 = &(h1[8]);
00175         /* for true threedes, we do one more hash to get the third key */
00176         hash = qshs(h1,20);
00177         bcopy(hash,h2,20);
00178         k3 = h2;
00179         switch (k->cipher) {
00180             case CFS_STD_DES:
00181                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,8);
00182                 bcopy(k2,k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.secondary,8);
00183                 break;
00184             case CFS_THREE_DES:
00185                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,8);
00186                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.secondary1,8);
00187                 bcopy(k2,k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary2,8);
00188                 bcopy(k2,k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.secondary2,8);
00189                 break;
00190             case CFS_TRUE_THREE_DES:
00191                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary1,8);
00192                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary1,8);
00193                 bcopy(k2,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary2,8);
00194                 bcopy(k2,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary2,8);
00195                 bcopy(k3,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary3,8);
00196                 bcopy(k3,k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary3,8);
00197                 break;
00198             case CFS_MACGUFFIN:
00199                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.primary,16);
00200                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.secondary,16);
00201                 break;
00202             case CFS_BLOWFISH:
00203                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.primary,16);
00204                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.secondary,16);
00205                 break;
00206             case CFS_SAFER_SK128:
00207                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.primary,16);
00208                 bcopy(k1,k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.secondary,16);
00209                 break;
00210             default:
00211                 break;
00212         }
00213         return 0;
00214 }
00215 
00216 decrypt_key(k,ek)
00217      cfs_admkey *k;
00218      u_char *ek;
00219 {
00220         mcg_key mk;
00221         BF_KEY bk;
00222         safer_key_t sk;
00223         
00224         switch (k->cipher) {
00225             case CFS_STD_DES:
00226                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,&(ek[0]),1);
00227                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.secondary,&(ek[0]),0);
00228                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,&(ek[0]),1);
00229                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,&(ek[8]),1);
00230                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.secondary,&(ek[8]),0);
00231                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,&(ek[8]),1);
00232                 bcopy(&(ek[0]),k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,8);
00233                 bcopy(&(ek[8]),k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.secondary,8);
00234                 break;
00235             case CFS_THREE_DES:
00236                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,&(ek[0]),1);
00237                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary2,&(ek[0]),0);
00238                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,&(ek[0]),1);
00239                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,&(ek[8]),1);
00240                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary2,&(ek[8]),0);
00241                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,&(ek[8]),1);
00242                 bcopy(&(ek[0]),k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,8);
00243                 bcopy(&(ek[0]),k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.secondary1,8);
00244                 bcopy(&(ek[8]),k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary2,8);
00245                 bcopy(&(ek[8]),k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.secondary2,8);
00246                 break;
00247             case CFS_TRUE_THREE_DES:
00248                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary3,&(ek[0]),1);
00249                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary2,&(ek[0]),1);
00250                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary1,&(ek[0]),1);
00251                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary3,&(ek[8]),1);
00252                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary2,&(ek[8]),1);
00253                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary1,&(ek[8]),1);
00254                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary3,&(ek[16]),1);
00255                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary2,&(ek[16]),1);
00256                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary1,&(ek[16]),1);
00257                 bcopy(&(ek[0]),k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary1,8);
00258                 bcopy(&(ek[0]),k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary1,8);
00259                 bcopy(&(ek[8]),k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary2,8);
00260                 bcopy(&(ek[8]),k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary2,8);
00261                 bcopy(&(ek[16]),k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary3,8);
00262                 bcopy(&(ek[16]),k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.secondary3,8);
00263                 break;
00264             case CFS_MACGUFFIN:
00265                 mcg_keyset(k->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.primary,&mk);
00266                 mcg_block_decrypt(&mk,&(ek[0]));
00267                 mcg_block_decrypt(&mk,&(ek[8]));
00268                 bcopy(ek,k->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.primary,16);
00269                 bcopy(ek,k->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.secondary,16);
00270                 break;
00271             case CFS_BLOWFISH:
00272                 BF_set_key(&bk,16,k->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.primary);
00273                 BF_encrypt(&(ek[0]),&bk,BF_DECRYPT);
00274                 BF_encrypt(&(ek[8]),&bk,BF_DECRYPT);
00275                 bcopy(ek,k->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.primary,16);
00276                 bcopy(ek,k->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.secondary,16);
00277                 break;
00278             case CFS_SAFER_SK128:
00279                 Safer_Init_Module();
00280                 Safer_Expand_Userkey(k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.primary,
00281                                      &(k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.primary[8]),
00282                                      SAFER_SK128_DEFAULT_NOF_ROUNDS, 1,
00283                                      sk);
00284                 Safer_Decrypt_Block(&(ek[0]),sk,&(ek[0]));
00285                 Safer_Decrypt_Block(&(ek[8]),sk,&(ek[8]));
00286                 bcopy(ek,k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.primary,16);
00287                 bcopy(ek,k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.secondary,16);
00288                 break;
00289             default:
00290                 break;
00291         }
00292 }
00293 
00294 encrypt_key(k,ek)
00295      cfs_admkey *k;
00296      u_char *ek;
00297 {
00298         mcg_key mk;
00299         BF_KEY bk;
00300         safer_key_t sk;
00301 
00302         switch (k->cipher) {
00303             case CFS_STD_DES:
00304                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,&(ek[0]),0);
00305                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.secondary,&(ek[0]),1);
00306                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,&(ek[0]),0);
00307                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,&(ek[8]),0);
00308                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.secondary,&(ek[8]),1);
00309                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.deskey.primary,&(ek[8]),0);
00310                 break;
00311             case CFS_THREE_DES:
00312                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,&(ek[0]),0);
00313                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary2,&(ek[0]),1);
00314                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,&(ek[0]),0);
00315                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,&(ek[8]),0);
00316                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary2,&(ek[8]),1);
00317                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.des3key.primary1,&(ek[8]),0);
00318                 break;
00319             case CFS_TRUE_THREE_DES:
00320                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary1,&(ek[0]),0);
00321                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary2,&(ek[0]),0);
00322                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary3,&(ek[0]),0);
00323                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary1,&(ek[8]),0);
00324                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary2,&(ek[8]),0);
00325                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary3,&(ek[8]),0);
00326                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary1,&(ek[16]),0);
00327                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary2,&(ek[16]),0);
00328                 q_block_cipher(k->cfs_admkey_u.tdes3key.primary3,&(ek[16]),0);
00329                 break;
00330             case CFS_BLOWFISH:
00331                 BF_set_key(&bk,16,k->cfs_admkey_u.blowkey.primary);
00332                 BF_encrypt(&(ek[0]),&bk,BF_ENCRYPT);
00333                 BF_encrypt(&(ek[8]),&bk,BF_ENCRYPT);
00334                 break;
00335             case CFS_MACGUFFIN:
00336                 mcg_keyset(k->cfs_admkey_u.mcgkey.primary,&mk);
00337                 mcg_block_encrypt(&mk,&(ek[0]));
00338                 mcg_block_encrypt(&mk,&(ek[8]));
00339                 break;
00340             case CFS_SAFER_SK128:
00341                 Safer_Init_Module();
00342                 Safer_Expand_Userkey(k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.primary,
00343                                      &(k->cfs_admkey_u.saferkey.primary[8]),
00344                                      SAFER_SK128_DEFAULT_NOF_ROUNDS, 1,
00345                                      sk);
00346                 Safer_Encrypt_Block(&(ek[0]),sk,&(ek[0]));
00347                 Safer_Encrypt_Block(&(ek[8]),sk,&(ek[8]));
00348                 break;
00349             default:
00350                 break;
00351         }
00352 }
